directions: Heat oil in a 2-quart saucepan over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking and brown neck and giblets. Add remaining ingredients and simmer until reduced to about 4 cups, 40 to 45 minutes. Pour stock through a fine sieve into a bowl. Skim off and discard any fat.
ingredients: Neck and giblets (excluding liver) from a 12- to 14-lb turkey
title: Turkey Giblet Stock
